header.title: What Happens With Your Donation?
header.desc: Every contribution goes through a carefully managed process to ensure maximum impact and transparency.

steps.title: You Donate
steps.desc: Your contribution is securely received through our platform.

steps.title: Allocation
steps.desc: Funds are allocated to verified charity campaigns.

steps.title: Distribution
steps.desc: Money is distributed to provide food, shelter, or healthcare.

steps.title: Impact
steps.desc: Donors receive updates with photos, stories, and real outcomes.

videoHeader.title: Witness the Difference
videoHeader.desc: Watch these videos to see how your donations transform lives and communities.
